attributes.action: Call on Theresa May to resign as Home Secretary
attributes.background: Theresa May in my opinion has been carrying out her systematic attack on Police Forces in the UK not due to requirements from Central Government but because of a conflict of interest due to her husband being a majority shareholder in G4S. I the undersigned call on her to resign

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a matter for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you are concerned about the Government's policy on policing, you could start a petition calling for a specific change in the policy.
